Title: Relates to requiring mandated reporters to receive coursework or training regarding the identification and reporting of child abuse and maltreatment
Summary: Requires mandated reporters to receive coursework or training regarding the identification and reporting of child abuse and maltreatment every three years.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law and the social services law, in relation to coursework or training regarding the identification and reporting of child abuse and maltreatment
